feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student demonstrates a working financial tool that performs budgeting, savings/debt planning, and daily stock suggestions, with concrete examples (income/expense numbers) and an implemented export to sheets plus user testing. Given these implemented features and validation, this meets the PASS standard under the moderate evaluation criteria.
- Integrate AI: The submission demonstrates concrete AI-driven features (daily stock recommendations, automated budget population, charting, and saving suggestions) that are implemented and used by others, showing added value. The combination of Discover, Implement, and Reflect evidence indicates effective AI integration beyond superficial use.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "So I built a workflow that um has two functions. One, it gives you a daily stock... But the main thing I'm excited about is I built a um a monthly budgeter."

"To summarize everything, I built a nan workflow that track tracks your budgets, gives you a daily suggestion on um stocks, and um gives you suggestions on how to cut back, and it really visualizes your results."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — identified financial needs and features (daily stock suggestions, monthly budgeter, saving and debt goals).  
Implement — exported results to sheets and shared the tool link with a roommate for real use.  
Reflect — summarized functionality and received user feedback validating expense visualization.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates a working financial tool that performs budgeting, savings/debt planning, and daily stock suggestions, with concrete examples (income/expense numbers) and an implemented export to sheets plus user testing. Given these implemented features and validation, this meets the PASS standard under the moderate evaluation criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So I built a workflow that um has two functions. One, it gives you a daily stock. Um so it it looks daily and tells you what like some hot stocks are."
"So, I built a um a monthly budgeter. So, it gives you all of your budgets for these categories. And it comes with a chart, too."
"So, my roommate had a big problem with overspending last this semester and so I sent him this link to use it for himself"
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: Identified user needs (daily stock suggestions and monthly budgeting goals).
- Implement: Built and shared a working workflow (sends results to sheets, shared link with roommate).
- Reflect: User feedback and summary confirm the AI features add practical value (visualization and savings suggestions).
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates concrete AI-driven features (daily stock recommendations, automated budget population, charting, and saving suggestions) that are implemented and used by others, showing added value. The combination of Discover, Implement, and Reflect evidence indicates effective AI integration beyond superficial use.
